item.title: Still not been swept, 27th November

item.title: Graffiti everywhere, 27th November
item.description:
Graffiti needs to be completely removed from the entire length of Peckham high street . It’s appalling many of these have been there since 1990s. It’s not art it’s just a mess which lowers the tone of Peckham.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Peckham High Street, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Block off pavement, 27th November
item.description:
Please as many times requested by residents to block off or place stooping gates as across as bikes and even motorbikes driving too fast and was told by old lady she was almost hit by one and myself coming back from Tesco. That use to be an old road but current concrete one are ok but for cars not smaller vehicles. Also wooden bit forgotten too collected from tower bins and next to smaller one always a lots of bulky times too. Thanks!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Marine Street, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Not finished bike line!, 27th November
item.description:
Hello there, Blocked off Old Jamaica Road between school and church Yad with same patron has been forgotten to finish as no signs painted for cyclists and missing stands from school side main gates; one black to block off as seen even car trying to drive and today park there and several smaller ones next to school as illegal parking too. Next to pub this side of old street was clean from benches but not big pots and road not friendly for bikes to drive as still. as not added on it signs and not ramp added. Bit of square used by where no cctv benches and in future this might collide.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St James's Road, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Church Yard, 27th November
item.description:
